title: Using Swift to write better code
blurb: Writing better code is what makes great developers, a great codebase, and great products. So how can you use Swift's power to make your life easier and your code even better?

title: Writing Better Code
blurb: So you know all those APIs, but how do you go about using them wisely? This talk gives a brief look into the benefits of writing better code, and the first steps to improving as a developer. Presented at Droidcon France 2015.

title: Code Whispering
blurb: Being a craftsman in development practices is only part of the problem! We'll have a brief look at some principles that help make great software, and the hints that your code can give you about what you can improve.

title: Lollipop and iPlayer
blurb: Take a look at the new APIs available in Android Lollipop, how to apply them, and what they look like in a production environment.
